{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Gryphon Online Safety |model=Gryphon |asin=B078Z3PTJP |price=250 |fcc_date=02/14/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WAPQ-244ACN |manuf_rev=V01 |type=wireless system |fcc_id=2AOIDGRYPHON01 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE7176H9, E071700; |cpu1_cspeed=716 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM8G1GEME-B041 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DTI |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE7176H9, E071700; |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE7176H9, E071700; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Gemtek WAPQ-244ACN |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NE646RTP, E064600; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |sw_cpu=false |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;CSR;CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, 6417T7;1;,,, 2.4GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY857309-11;SKY857309-11, 4349T, 1434 MY;2;,,, 5GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;SKY85728-11, <..>, 1552 MY;2;,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier;RFMD;RFPA5542;>>>, PA5542, O10E;4;,,, |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, Bluetooth LE, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] backhaul (80MHz chan.), :• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] clients (80MHz chan.), :• '''400Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] clients (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''3000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Gryphon Wireless Router}} {{ProductPage|https://gryphonconnect.com/}} "WAPQ-244ACN_V01" and "ES0-S15-5301R" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. FCC BLE report lists the "IPQ-4019" and QCA9984. ===See also=== * [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]]
